content.body: Did https://hacks.mozilla.org/2021/12/webassembly-and-back-again-fine-grained-sandboxing-in-firefox-95/ end up regressing how Firefox deals with innerHTML in XML? C.f. https://bugs.webkit.org/show_bug.cgi?id=181642
sorry, it was already end of day for me when this thread continued. I am fbraun@mozilla.com
